name: No Pants
description:
I wake up at the city street after a night out. But wait! Somethings missing. MY PANTS! So embarassing. Heck, when I get some more to drink I won't care.

Control the character through the city streets trying to avoid other people, and balance your embarassment with your drunkenness.

A game made for Nordic Game Jam 2017 by:

  • Alex Simon
  • Anders Stensholdt
  • Andreas Hansen
  • Mads Vesterager Riddersholm
  • Mikkel Stenkjær Hansen
  • Radu Jipa
